summary: Worker constructor lacks connection options, forcing localhost-only connections. This issue requests adding connection options to the worker constructor and passing them to core initialization.
userImpact: Users cannot connect workers to remote Temporal servers, limiting deployment flexibility to local development only.
proposedFix: Add connection options parameter to worker constructor and pass them through to core initialization
resolutionDetails: Connection options were added to worker constructor
keyQuote: Currently can only connect to localhost.
